context: Hello. How are you today? I'm having a fantastic day, hope you are as well. What kind of movies do you like?
I'm in the mood for funny. I really enjoyed The Other Woman (2014)
Oh nice! Have you seen Girls Trip (2017) or Game Night (2018) ? Both were hilarious! I also love Super Troopers (2001) can't wait for Super Troopers 2 (2018)
Nope, but I am taking notes, so they go on my list. Oh, and glad you're having a good day!
resp: Hah. Thank you! I'd also recommend Deadpool 2 (2018) Even if you haven't seen Deadpool (2016)
